MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: $ azure login info: Executing command login warn: Please note that currently you can login only via Microsoft organizational account or service principal. For instructions on how to set them up, please read http://aka.ms/Dhf67j. Username: ahmet@contoso.onmicrosoft.com Password: ********* |info: Added subscription Visual Studio Ultimate with MSDN info: Setting subscription Visual Studio Ultimate with MSDN as default info: Added subscription Azure Free Trial + info: login command OK

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Associate an Azure AD Directory with a new Azure Subscription
Associate an Azure AD Directory with a new Azure Subscription

CodeSpanItem.ItemValue: azure account set <subscription id or name> true
azure account set <subscription id or name> true

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: $ azure account set "Azure Free Trial" true info: Executing command account set info: Setting subscription to "Azure Free Trial" with id "2lskd82-434-4730-9df9-akd83lsk92sa". info: Changes saved info: account set command OK
$ azure config mode arm info: New mode is arm
